articles.author: Brian Steinberg
articles.title: Budweiser Super Bowl Commercial Teams Clydesdale With American Bald Eagle, ‘Free Bird’ - Variety
articles.description: Budweiser's newest Super Bowl commercial will team a Clydesdale with a bald eagle and the Lynyrd Skynyrd classic 'Free Bird' in a pro-America spot
articles.content:
Budweiser has long used the Super Bowl to tie its stately Clydesdale horses to the national mood.  This year, the brewer’s stance won’t be hard to understand.
In one of the beer giant’s less subtle … [+4172 chars]
